software_engineer.title: Software Engineer
software_engineer.description: I started working here after completing my end-of-studies internship. I develop, maintain, and improve the company's applications. I also manage, in collaboration with the CTO, all aspects of the company's infrastructure, including servers, databases, and development tools.

voltaire.title: Founder
voltaire.description: Creation of an AI assistant specialized in writing, addressing the limitations of general-purpose tools such as ChatGPT.

prompt_pilot.title: Founder
prompt_pilot.description: Creation of a tool for generating prompts optimized for LLM, solving the problem of vague and unstructured responses.

42_school.title: Student
42_school.description: Innovative computer training that is free and open to all, with no diploma required, based on project-based learning and peer support. It stands out for its educational approach without teachers or traditional classes, promoting autonomy, creativity, and technical excellence.
